chunks.zh: 曾经喜欢的女生结婚了，怎么放下这段关系
chunks.en: The girl you used to like got married, how do you let go of this relationship?

chunks.zh: “曾经喜欢”并不是一种不是关系，所以你俩到底啥关系，没啥关系不联系就好了，时间会解决一切问题。
chunks.en: 'Used to like' is not a relationship. So what exactly is your relationship? If there's no relationship, just don't contact her. Time will solve everything.

chunks.zh: shift + crtl + enter 键自动 发了我回复说 凭心而论男闺蜜真的是一段稳定恋情中的最不稳定的因素祝你幸福也给我留下最后的体面！在这之后 虽然留下了 V 好友 但我把她朋友圈都屏蔽了 她结婚也没通知我 2024 年春节过年的时候突然想起来 看了一下她的朋友圈 婚纱照很漂亮 后面又在视频号看到她的怀孕日记 还有宝宝周岁日记 心中有所波澜但其实也没啥特别的感觉从 2011->2021 相识十年 期间我交过三任女朋友 分手后又去她的港湾倾诉 她就安静地听着 不时安慰我一番 她也于 2019 年交往过一个男朋友 头天晚上答应女生的告白 然后第二天晚上就因为男生上头啃她脸（抱着她亲她脸）被吓得分手 我们约定 30 岁之前如果彼此都没结婚就凑合在一起过活 哈哈哈说这么多没啥其它的意思 不是让 op 体会我的心境 也不是让 op 感觉到我们之间好似有共鸣 人 成年人 成年男人 都有来源于经济和家庭的压力 向前看 别人的生活很好 和你有何相干 朋友之间只需要祝福 她值得更好的  你也值得更好的
chunks.en: shift + crtl + enter automatically sent my reply saying, honestly, male best friends are the most unstable factor in a stable relationship. I wish you happiness and leave me with the last bit of dignity! After that, although I kept her on WeChat, I blocked her Moments. She didn't tell me she was getting married. During the Spring Festival in 2024, I suddenly remembered and looked at her Moments. The wedding photos were beautiful. Later, I saw her pregnancy diary and her baby's first birthday diary on her video account. My heart fluttered a bit, but there wasn't really any special feeling. From 2011 -> 2021, we knew each other for ten years. During that time, I had three girlfriends, and after breaking up, I would go to her harbor to confide. She would listen quietly and comfort me from time to time. She also dated a boyfriend in 2019. She accepted the guy's confession one night, but the next night she broke up because the guy got carried away and kissed her face (hugged her and kissed her face) and scared her. We agreed that if we were both still unmarried before the age of 30, we would just get together and live together, hahaha. Saying so much doesn't mean anything else. It's not to make OP understand my mood, nor to make OP feel like we have any resonance. People, adults, adult men, all have pressures from the economy and family. Look forward. Other people's lives are good, what does it have to do with you? Friends only need blessings. She deserves better, and you deserve better too.

chunks.zh: 人家老公新婚夜都灌成泡芙了，你还在这相思呢
chunks.en: Her husband was filled like a cream puff on their wedding night, and you're still longing for her here?

chunks.zh: 想象一下她被其他男的猛骑的场面就释怀了
chunks.en: Just imagine the scene of her being fiercely ridden by another man and you'll be relieved.

chunks.zh: 结婚了，这下更喜欢了
chunks.en: She's married, now I like her even more.

chunks.zh: 曾经喜欢奔驰 G63 的，被买走了，怎么放下这段关系
chunks.en: I used to like the Mercedes G63, but it was bought. How do I let go of this relationship?

chunks.zh: @MuSeCanYang 这位岛国网友请冷静
chunks.en: @MuSeCanYang This island nation netizen, please calm down.

chunks.zh: 你放不下的，人家已经放进去了
chunks.en: What you can't let go of, someone else has already put it in.

chunks.zh: 谁还没有个白月光了，一辈子总会有遗憾，好好对待身边的人，内心那一点遗憾藏在内心最深的角落里面就行了。
chunks.en: Who doesn't have a 'white moonlight' (unattainable love)? There will always be regrets in life. Treat the people around you well, and just hide that little regret in the deepest corner of your heart.

chunks.zh: 她都变成别人的形状了
chunks.en: She's become someone else's shape.

chunks.zh: 每一个你想操的女人背后，都有一个操她操到想吐的男人
chunks.en: Behind every woman you want to fuck, there's a man who's already fucked her to the point of vomiting.

chunks.zh: 人家都结婚了你还放不下？想给人家养孩子吗
chunks.en: She's already married and you still can't let go? Do you want to raise her children?

chunks.zh: 认识新的女生。别把自己想的有那么深情，碰到更漂亮更满足你审美的就会忘了。放不下只是因为接触不到更好的罢了
chunks.en: Meet new girls. Don't think of yourself as so sentimental. You'll forget her when you meet someone prettier and more to your aesthetic satisfaction. You can't let go simply because you haven't been exposed to anything better.

chunks.zh: 这跟你有啥关系？
chunks.en: What does this have to do with you?

chunks.zh: 想起一句话，你喜欢的只是一类人。
chunks.en: Reminds me of a saying, you only like a certain type of person.

chunks.zh: 等她离婚，你来接盘
chunks.en: Wait for her to get divorced and then you take over.

chunks.zh: 早干嘛去了，现在建议你闭嘴啊
chunks.en: What were you doing earlier? Now I suggest you shut up.

chunks.zh: 发展成为情人
chunks.en: Develop into a lover.

chunks.zh: 当初林志玲嫁给黑澤良平的时候我也强烈反对啊，有用吗，该放手还得放手😪
chunks.en: I strongly opposed when Lin Chi-ling married Akira, but did it help? You still have to let go when it's time to let go. 😪

chunks.zh: 想想她被她老公日到发昏时的场景，你大概就会释然。
chunks.en: Imagine the scene of her being fucked senseless by her husband, and you'll probably be relieved.
